name: NARUTO FX
description:
A collection of 30 Naruto FX effects exported into loop-able animations. 

All FX include 25 and 32 frames of eye-sizzling animation and have been exported to PNG,PSD sprite sheets and PNG sequences. 

Single frame dimensions are 200×200 and sprite sheet pixel dimensions 1000×1000 and 2000×800. 

Separate png files also included.

Animation Preview:-
https://www.behance.net/gallery/61809997/Naruto-FX?

Its very simple to use. And fit for all kind of game engine So don’t worry and have a fun.

 Feel Free to Ask any help !!

 Thanks u ALL!! 🙂
